comments:
Hi,
I download all prerequsite Eclipse, EMF, GEF from
http://download.eclipse.org/tools/ve/downloads/drops/I-I20040603a-200406031410/index.html
and I still can't activate VE with eclipse.
Whenever I tried to open my java file with VE, I got following:
(Similar error also show up when I tried to create new Visual Class.)

Try removing the .metadata directory from your workspace and the configuration
directory from your eclipse installation, then try launching the VE again.
Since VE 1.1 has shipped and no further info since June 2004, closing defect.
